Interface IDirectoryPlace

All Superinterfaces:
IServiceProviderPlace
All Known Subinterfaces:

public interface IDirectoryPlace extends IServiceProviderPlace
Interface for normal directory operations

    • removePlaces

      int removePlaces(List<String> keys)
      Deregister places. Removes all keys for the specified places
      Parameters:
      keys - four-tuple key for the place
      Returns:
      count of keys removed

      Make directory contents entry keys available for display and transfer
      Returns:
      Iterator of String in the DataID format DATATYPE::SERVICETYPE

    • getEntryList

      DirectoryEntryList getEntryList(String dataId)
      Get the requested directory entry
      Parameters:
      dataId - the key to the entry Map set of DirectoryEntryList objects
      Returns:
      a DirectoryEntryList object for the key or null if none

      Get a list of the keys of all the peer directories known here

    • addObserver

      void addObserver(DirectoryObserver observer)
      Add an observer for one of the observable activities in the directory The runtime class of the observer determines what is being observed
      Parameters:
      observer - the new DirectoryObserver to add

    • deleteObserver

      boolean deleteObserver(DirectoryObserver observer)
      Remove an observer previously registered with this directory
      Parameters:
      observer - the object to remove
      Returns:
      true if it was found on the list

    • isRemoteDirectoryAvailable

      boolean isRemoteDirectoryAvailable(String key)
      Get the heartbeat status of a remote directory as seen from this directory.
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the remote directory
      Returns:
      true if remote is up, false otherwise

      Returns:
